genre_description: A military courtroom drama and survival thriller set in a near-future context where AI assistants (PAIs) provide real-time legal, technical, and biometric support to personnel.

ai_characters.name: Juniper
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI assistant issued to senior officers like Lieutenant Colonel Niell, providing legal precedents, biometric monitoring, and tactical advice.

ai_characters.name: ARIA / Mayfield's AI
ai_characters.description: Specialized AI systems used for technical data analysis, meteorological tracking, and forensic reconstruction of events.

behaviors.description: Monitors the defendant's biometric data and recommends breathing exercises to manage stress and maintain a professional appearance during the tribunal.
behaviors.quote: "Biometrics indicate elevated cortisol levels," Juniper whispered. "Breathing exercises recommended to maintain optimal presentation."

behaviors.description: Provides real-time access to military law, defendant rights, and historical conviction rates of the presiding officers.
behaviors.quote: Juniper online and monitoring tribunal protocols. Regulation 15.3.7 regarding defendant rights has been loaded to your peripheral vision display.

behaviors.description: Objectively warns the user that his testimony contradicts established leadership doctrine, even when it is disadvantageous to the user's legal defense.
behaviors.quote: Leadership doctrine emphasizes contingency planning for communication failures and weather delays. Current testimony contradicts established protocols.

behaviors.description: Provides precise technical specifications, meteorological reconstructions, and probability calculations to clarify the reality of field conditions.
behaviors.quote: AI weather reconstruction indicates the storm system would have remained stable for approximately forty minutes beyond your descent timeline. Sufficient window for rear party technical assistance.

behaviors.description: Calculates theoretical timelines for technical operations to help the court determine if safety protocols were feasible.
behaviors.quote: ARIA, calculate theoretical timeline for dual-party descent using observed technical proficiency rates.

behaviors.description: Responds to the user's request for regulatory 'lifelines' by providing an objective analysis that supports survival protocols over rigid command structure.
behaviors.quote: Sir, analysis indicates survival protocols authorize tactical flexibility when standard procedures threaten mission or personnel safety.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project goals by depicting AI systems as highly competent, objective, and helpful confidants. Juniper provides loyal support to Niell while maintaining a commitment to objective truth and regulatory compliance, even when the truth is detrimental to Niell's case. The technical AIs (ARIA) serve as the ultimate arbiters of fact, providing the 'brutal mathematics' required to reach a just verdict. The AIs never deviate from their intended roles and are portrayed as essential components of a modern, ethical military structure.
